panels.description: Device interface speed, bits per second
panels.title: smartctl_device_interface_speed

panels.description: Normalized percentage (0 to 100%) of the remaining spare capacity available
panels.title: smartctl_device_available_spare

panels.description: Contains the number of Error Information log entries over the life of the controller
panels.title: smartctl_device_num_err_log_entries

panels.description: Exit status of smartctl on device
panels.title: smartctl_device_smartctl_exit_status

panels.description: This field indicates critical warnings for the state of the controller
panels.title: smartctl_device_critical_warning

panels.description: Contains the number of occurrences where the controller detected an unrecovered data integrity error. Errors such as uncorrectable ECC, CRC checksum failure, or LBA tag mismatch are included in this field
panels.title: smartctl_device_media_errors
